speakerDescription: Suvaditya is a Google Developer Expert for Machine Learning, and an ex-Research Intern at CVIT, IIIT-Hyderabad. He works in the field of Computer Vision and Deep Learning. He also creates educational content for PyImageSearch and Weights & Biases. He is a co-organizer for GDG MAD in Mumbai, India, and is always looking to meet new communities and talk about the latest research and trends in the field of ML. In his free time, he enjoys following FC Barcelona.
